justification: "Our goal was to create a dance-step DSP task that would encompass the same properties at the basic level to measure behavioural performances" (i.e., response time and accuracy used to index sequence learning).
"We captured subjective physical demand and effort via the commonly administered NASA-TLX (Hart & Staveland, 1988), to check if participants were overly fatigued from each training block."

measured_by: Xsens MTw Awinda inertial motion capture system with MVN Analyze
justification: "The current protocol is focused on capturing measurements of CoM… Combined with… MVN Analyze software, precise estimations of segment/sensor displacement, velocity and angular acceleration can be acquired."

"Participants were also tested on their foot dominance… confirmed by having them perform a simple footedness test that involves first closing their eyes… and then pushing them from behind which typically caused them to take a step forward with their dominant foot."
